蹢字的基本解释

蹢
dí
蹄子。

蹢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dí］
［《廣韻》都歷切，入錫，端。］
亦作“豴1”。
兽蹄。
[②]［zhí］
［《廣韻》直炙切，入昔，澄。］
(1)见“蹢2躅”。
(2)通“擿”。投。

蹢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　蹢； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1232第35
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】直炙切【正韻】直隻切，?音擲。【說文】住足也。一曰蹢躅，賈侍中說，足垢也。【博雅】蹢䠱，跢跦也。【易·垢卦】羸豕孚蹢䠱。【釋文】蹢䠱，不靜也。一本作躑。【程傳】跳躑也。又【禮·三年問】蹢䠱，焉踟躕焉。【釋文】蹢䠱，不行也。　又【集韻】治革切，音謫。義同。　又【廣韻】都歷切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丁歷切，?音的。【詩·小雅】有豕白蹢。【傳】蹢，蹄也。【爾雅·釋畜】馬四蹢皆白，首。　又【莊子·徐無鬼】齊人蹢於宋者。【音義】蹢，投也。呈亦反。

考證：〔【說文】住足也。一曰，蹢躅。賈待中說，足垢也。〕　謹照原文待中改侍中。

Basic explanation of words
hoof
dí
Hoof.
hoof
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dí］
["Guangyun" is always cut, enter the tin, and end. ]
Also known as "豴1".
Beast hooves.
[②]［zhí］
["Guangyun" straight cut, into the past, clear. ]
(1) See "蹢2躅".
(2) Through "擿". cast.
hoof
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　蹢; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1232 Page 35
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Jiyun] Straight and cut [Zhengyun] Straight only cut,? Toss. [Said the text] Live enough. One said wagging, Jia Shizhong said, the feet are also dirty. 【Bo Ya】Walking, stomping. 【Easy·Difficulty hexagram】Yi qi and Fu qi. 【Explanation】Walking, not quiet. One book for hedging. [Cheng Chuan] Jump and walk. Also [Li·Three Years Questions] Hesitated, hesitated. 【Explanation】Walking, it doesn't work.　[Jiyun] Remedy and cut, the sound is banished. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] All Li Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ding Liqie, sound. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】There are hogs and white wrinkles. [Biography] Swap, hoof. 【Erya·Shi Hu】The four horses are all white, the first.　[Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui] The people of Qi were in the Song Dynasty. [Sound and Meaning] Slap, cast too. It is also the opposite. Textual research: [[Said the text] live enough. One said, wavy. Jia Dazhong said, Foot Difficulty. 〕 　 I would like to wait for the change according to the original text.
